title: vElanEy vErE
sahitya:
vElanE vErE gati ilanE nin pAdam allAl



anupallavi



shIlanE nArada gAnalOlanE nin bAlanEn nAn



caraNam



yAzhi nEr mozhiyAL vizhi Ezhishai shubhapantuvarALiyAL vaLLikk-ishainda manavAlanE
EzhaiyErkk-irangayEl nAn ensheivEn kavi kunjaradAsanen shonnEn en
manadAravE prabhuv  vibhuvE vibhuvE
